name: @onepersonunicorn/lolgpt
description: AI-powered League of Legends professional esports match predictor and summoner analysis tool. Predict outcomes for T1, Faker, Zeus, and other pro players with advanced statistical modeling.

scripts.postinstall: python3 -m pip install --user -r requirements.txt || pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt || echo 'Warning: Could not install Python dependencies automatically. Please run: pip install fastmcp requests'

author: lolGPT Team
